name: 奇怪
的
信
pinyin: Hālì měitiān dōu qīdài zhuó xīn de yī tiān.
Dànshì zhè yītiān, tā shōudào le qíguài de xìn.
Xìn de wàimiàn yǒu yīgè dà yìnzhāng.
Fúnóng kàndào xìn, lìkè biàn dé hěn shēngqì.
Tā shuō: 'Zhè fēng xìn bù kěyǐ gěi Hālì!'
Pèinī yě hěn jǐnzhāng, tā shuō: 'Wǒmen yào bǎ tā rēng diào.'
Dálì kàndào xìn, wèn: 'Zhè shì shénme xìn?'
Fúnóng duì Dálì shuō: 'Bùyào wèn!'
Hālì xiǎng zhīdào xìn lǐ xiěle shénme.
Tā hěn xiǎoxīn de kànzhe Fúnóng.
Fúnóng bǎ xìn cáng qǐlái le.
Dànshì xìn háishì lái le, yuè lái yuè duō de xìn!
Měitiān, xìn dōu zài ménkǒu děngzhe tāmen.
Fúnóng yuè lái yuè fèn nù, tā juédìng yào jiějué zhège wèntí.
Tā shuō: 'Wǒmen yào bāng jiā!'
Yúshì, tāmen líkāi le jiā, qùle yī jiān xiǎo lǚguǎn.
Dànshì xìn réngrán gēnzhe tāmen.
Hālì xīn lǐ xiǎng: 'Zhè fēng xìn hěn zhòngyào ma?'
Zhōngyú, yǒu yītiān, xìn yòu láile.
Fúnóng qì dé yào bàozhà, tā bǎ xìn rēng jìnle lājī tǒng.
Hālì gǎndào nán guò, tā xiǎng zhīdào zìjǐ de mìmì.
Tā zhīdào, zhè fēng xìn hé tā yǒu guān.
Jiù zài zhè shí, yīgè gāo gèzi de rén qiāo le qiánmén.
Tā shuō: 'Nǐ hǎo, wǒ lái jiàn Hālì.'
Fúnóng hěn shēngqì, dàn tā wúfǎ zǔzhǐ zhège rén.
Gāo gèzi de rén wēixiào zhe, gěi Hālì kànle yī fēng xìn.
Tā gàosu Hālì: 'Nǐ shì mófǎshī.'
Hālì jīngyà de wèn: 'Zhēn de ma?'
Gāo gèzi de rén shuō: 'Shì de, huānyíng lái dào mófǎ de shìjiè.'
Zhè yī kè, Hālì zhīdào tā de shēnghuó jiāng huì gǎibiàn.
Xìn de mìmì zhōngyú jiē kāi le.
Tā jiāng kāishǐ yīduàn xīn de lǚchéng.
english: Harry looks forward to a new day every day.
But this day, he received a strange letter.
The letter has a big seal on the outside.
Vernon sees the letter and immediately gets very angry.
He says: 'This letter cannot be given to Harry!'
Petunia is also very nervous, she says: 'We must throw it away.'
Dudley sees the letter and asks: 'What is this letter?'
Vernon tells Dudley: 'Don't ask!'
Harry wants to know what is written in the letter.
He carefully looks at Vernon.
Vernon hides the letter.
But the letters keep coming, more and more letters!
Every day, letters are waiting at the door for them.
Vernon gets angrier and angrier, he decides to solve this problem.
He says: 'We have to move!'
So they leave their home and go to a small hotel.
But the letters still follow them.
Harry thinks inside: 'Is this letter very important?'
Finally, one day, the letter comes again.
Vernon explodes with anger, he throws the letter into the trash can.
Harry feels sad, he wants to know his secret.
He knows that this letter is related to him.
Just then, a tall man knocks on the door.
He says: 'Hello, I’m here to see Harry.'
Vernon is very angry, but he can't stop this man.
The tall man smiles and shows Harry a letter.
He tells Harry: 'You are a wizard.'
Harry asks in surprise: 'Really?'
The tall man says: 'Yes, welcome to the magical world.'
At this moment, Harry knows his life will change.
The secret of the letter is finally revealed.
He will begin a new journey.

name: 弗农
的
愤怒
pinyin: Fúnóng duì xìn de dào lái fēicháng shēngqì.
Tā dàshēng shuō: 'Zhè fēng xìn bùnéng ràng Hālì kàn dào!'
Tā bǎ xìn sī dé fěn suì.
Pèinī shìtú ānwèi Fúnóng, 'Bié shēngqì, qīn'ài de.'
Dànshì Fúnóng gèng jiā fèn nù, 'Wǒmen yào zhǔzhǐ zhèxiē xìn!'
Dálì kàndào fùqīn shēngqì, wèn: 'Bàba, wǒmen yào zuò shénme?'
Fúnóng shuō: 'Wǒmen yào líkāi zhège dìfāng!'
Tāmen kuàisù dǎbāo xínglǐ, zhǔnbèi bāng jiā.
Fúnóng shuō: 'Wǒmen qù yīgè méiyǒu rén zhīdào de dìfāng.'
Pèinī dānxīn de shuō: 'Zhēn de yǒu bìyào ma?'
Dálì xīngfèn de wèn: 'Néng bùnéng qù yóulèyuán?'
Fúnóng méiyǒu huídá, jìxù máng zhe dǎbāo.
Tāmen kāichē líkāi, xúnzhǎo xīn jiā.
Zài lù shàng, Hālì xīn lǐ hěn nánguò.
Tā xiǎng: 'Wǒ wèishéme bùnéng kàn xìn?'
Fúnóng zài chē lǐ dàshēng shuō: 'Hālì, bié zài xiǎng nà fēng xìn!'
Hālì dī xià tóu, xīn lǐ chōngmǎn yíwèn.
Tāmen lái dào yīgè xiǎo lǚguǎn.
Fúnóng shuō: 'Zhè lǐ huì ānquán.'
Dànshì wǎnshàng, xìn yòu láile!
Fúnóng qì dé yào fā fēng, 'Zhè shì shénme qíngkuàng?'
Tā bǎ xìn rēng diào, xīn lǐ àn xiǎng: 'Wǒ yīdìng yào jiějué zhège wèntí.'
Hālì mòmò sī kǎo, xìn dào dǐ yǒu shénme mìmì?
english: Vernon is very angry about the arrival of the letters.
He loudly says: 'This letter cannot be seen by Harry!'
He tears the letter to pieces.
Petunia tries to comfort Vernon, 'Don't be angry, dear.'
But Vernon gets even angrier, 'We must stop these letters!'
Dudley sees his father angry and asks: 'Dad, what are we going to do?'
Vernon says: 'We have to leave this place!'
They quickly pack their bags and prepare to move.
Vernon says: 'We will go to a place where nobody knows us.'
Petunia worries and says: 'Is it really necessary?'
Dudley excitedly asks: 'Can we go to the amusement park?'
Vernon does not answer and continues packing.
They drive away, looking for a new home.
On the road, Harry feels very sad.
He thinks: 'Why can't I see the letter?'
Vernon shouts in the car: 'Harry, stop thinking about that letter!'
Harry lowers his head, his heart full of questions.
They arrive at a small hotel.
Vernon says: 'This place will be safe.'
But at night, the letter comes again!
Vernon is furious, 'What is going on?'
He throws the letter away, thinking: 'I must solve this problem.'
Harry silently wonders, what secret does the letter hold?

name: 信件
越来越
多
pinyin: Hālì hé tā de jiārén gāng dào xīn dìfāng.
Fúnóng shìtú bǎochí lěngjìng.
Dàn xìnjiàn shì bùduàn sòng lái.
Měitiān dōu yǒu xīn de xìn.
Xìn fēng shàng xiězhe: 'Gěi Hālì·Bōtè.'
Dálì wèn: 'Bàba, wèishéme zǒng shì gěi Hālì de xìn?'
Fúnóng shēngqì de shuō: 'Wǒ bù zhīdào!'
Pèinī yě kāishǐ dānxīn, 'Wǒmen wèishéme bù dǎkāi yī fēng kàn kàn?'
Fúnóng jiānjué shuō: 'Juédé bù kěyǐ!'
Hālì xīn lǐ chōngmǎn le yíwèn, 'Zhèxiē xìn dào dǐ yǒu shénme?'
Tā juédìng tōutōu de kàn yī kàn.
Yītiān wǎnshàng, Hālì zài fángjiān lǐ děngzhe.
Tā tīngdàomén wài yǒu shēngyīn.
Tā xiǎo xīn yìyì de zǒu dào ménkǒu.
Xìn yòu láile, kuàidìyuán bǎ xìn fàng zài dìshàng.
Hālì jímáng dǎkāi mén, 'Děng děng!'
Dàn kuàidìyuán yǐjīng zǒule.
Hālì kànzhe ménkǒu de xìn, xīn lǐ hěn xīngfèn.
Xìn shàng xiězhe: 'Hālì, qǐng lái mófǎ xuéxiào.'
Tā bù zhīdào mófǎ xuéxiào shì shénme, dàn tā xiǎng zhīdào gèng duō.
Fúnóng yòu kāishǐ dānxīn, 'Wǒmen bìxū líkāi zhèlǐ!'
Dálì xīngfèn de shuō: 'Néng bùnéng qù hǎibiān?'
Pèinī shuō: 'Bùyào zài bāng jiāle.'
Dànshì xìnjiàn yuè lái yuè duō, Fúnóng wúfǎ rěnshòu.
Hālì zhīdào, zhèxiē xìnjiàn yīdìng yǒu zhòngyào de shìqíng.
english: Harry and his family just arrived at the new place.
Vernon tries to stay calm.
But the letters keep coming.
Every day there are new letters.
The envelopes are addressed: 'For Harry Potter.'
Dudley asks: 'Dad, why are the letters always for Harry?'
Vernon angrily replies: 'I don't know!'
Petunia starts to worry, 'Why don't we open one to see?'
Vernon firmly says: 'Absolutely not!'
Harry is full of questions, 'What do these letters mean?'
He decides to sneak a look.
One night, Harry is waiting in his room.
He hears a noise outside the door.
He carefully walks to the door.
The letter has arrived, the courier puts the letter down.
Harry quickly opens the door, 'Wait!'
But the courier has already left.
Harry looks at the letter on the floor, excited.
The letter says: 'Harry, please come to the magic school.'
He doesn't know what a magic school is, but he wants to know more.
Vernon starts to worry again, 'We must leave this place!'
Dudley excitedly asks: 'Can we go to the beach?'
Petunia says: 'No more moving.'
But the letters keep coming, and Vernon can't take it anymore.
Harry knows that these letters must have something important.

name: 逃离
家园
pinyin: Fúnóng fēicháng shēngqì.
Tā juédìng dài jiārén líkāi zhège dìfāng.
Pèinī wèn: 'Wǒmen qù nǎlǐ?'
Fúnóng shuō: 'Qù yīgè méiyǒu xìn de dìfāng!'
Dálì xīngfèn de shuō: 'Wǒmen qù yóulèyuán ba!'
Hālì gǎndào hàipà, 'Wǒ bùxiǎng líkāi jiā.'
Fúnóng bù lǐ Hālì, 'Kuài diǎn, shōushí dōngxī!'
Tāmen kāishǐ shōushí xínglǐ.
Hālì xīnlǐ zhèngzài xiǎngzhe xìn de shìqíng.
Bùjiǔ, tāmen shàngle chē.
Fúnóng kāichē, Pèinī zuò zài pángbiān.
Dálì zài hòumiàn wán wánjù.
Chēzi kāile hěn jiǔ, zhōngyú tíngle xiàlái.
Fúnóng shuō: 'Wǒmen zài zhèlǐ xiūxí.'
Hālì kàn dào zhōuwéi de huánjìng, 'Zhèlǐ kàn qǐlái hěn shēng.'
Tā gǎndào bù ān, 'Wǒ xiǎng huí jiā.'
Pèinī ānwèi tā shuō: 'Méishì, Hālì.'
Dàn Hālì xīnlǐ réngrán zhèngzài xiǎngzhe xìn.
Tā juédìng yào zhǎodào dà'àn.
english: Vernon is very angry.
He decides to take the family away from this place.
Petunia asks: 'Where are we going?'
Vernon says: 'To a place without letters!'
Dudley excitedly says: 'Can we go to the amusement park!'
Harry feels scared, 'I don’t want to leave home.'
Vernon ignores Harry, 'Hurry, pack your things!'
They start to pack their luggage.
Harry is thinking about the letters.
He hopes to find the answer to the letters.
Soon, they get in the car.
Vernon drives, and Petunia sits beside him.
Dudley plays with his toys in the back.
The car drives for a long time and finally stops.
Vernon says: 'We will rest here.'
Harry looks at the strange surroundings, 'This place looks unfamiliar.'
He feels uneasy, 'I want to go home.'
Petunia comforts him: 'It’s okay, Harry.'
But Harry is still thinking about the letters.
He decides he wants to find the answer.

人

到来
5_arival_of_the_tall_man.description: The Arrival of the Tall Man
pinyin: Hālì zài chē lǐ gǎndào jǐnzhāng.
Tā bù zhīdào gāo gèzi rén shì shéi.
Fúnóng jìxù kāichē, jǐnliàng bù ràng Hālì dānxīn.
Túrán, chē wài chūxiàn yīgè gāo gèzi rén.
Zhège gāo gèzi rén zǒu dào tāmen de chē páng.
Fúnóng kàn dào le, liǎnsè biàn de hěn nánkàn.
Gāo gèzi rén wēixiào zhe shuō: 'Nǐ hǎo, Hālì!'
Hālì jīngyà de kànzhe tā, 'Nǐ shì shéi?'
Gāo gèzi rén huídá: 'Wǒ shì Hǎigé, láizì Huògēwòcí.'
Fúnóng dàshēng shuō: 'Nǐ bù kěyǐ dài tā zǒu!'
Hǎigé méiyǒu lǐhuì Fúnóng, jìxù duì Hālì shuō: 'Nǐ shì gè wūshī.'
Hālì gǎndào kùnhuò, 'Wūshī? Wǒ bù shì pǔtōng rén ma?'
Hǎigé diǎndiǎn tóu, 'Nǐ yǒu hěnduō tèbié de shìqíng yào zhīdào.'
Fúnóng fēicháng shēngqì, 'Kuài zǒu, Hālì! Wǒmen bù xūyào zhège!'
Hǎigé jiāndìng de shuō: 'Hālì xūyào zhīdào zhēnxiàng.'
Hālì de xīntào jiāzú, 'Wǒ xiǎng zhīdào zhēnxiàng.'
Gāo gèzi rén shēnchū shǒu, 'Lái ba, Hālì.'
Hālì yóuyù le yīxià, dàn tā juédìng gēnzhuī Hǎigé.
Tā zhīdào, zhè jiāng shì yīgè xīn de kāishǐ.
english: Harry feels nervous in the car.
He doesn't know who the tall man is.
Vernon continues to drive, trying not to worry Harry.
Suddenly, a tall man appears outside the car.
The tall man walks to their car.
Vernon sees him and looks very unhappy.
The tall man smiles and says: 'Hello, Harry!'
Harry looks at him in surprise, 'Who are you?'
The tall man replies: 'I am Hagrid, from Hogwarts.'
Vernon shouts: 'You can't take him away!'
Hagrid ignores Vernon and continues to say to Harry: 'You are a wizard.'
Harry feels confused, 'A wizard? Am I not an ordinary person?'
Hagrid nods, 'You have many special things to know.'
Vernon is very angry, 'Hurry, Harry! We don't need this!'
Hagrid firmly says: 'Harry needs to know the truth.'
Harry's heart races, 'I want to know the truth.'
The tall man extends his hand, 'Come on, Harry.'
Harry hesitates but decides to follow Hagrid.
He knows this will be a new beginning.

name: 哈利
的
秘密
pinyin: Hālì gēnzhe Hǎigé zǒu jìnle yīpiàn sēnlín.
Tā gǎndào xīngfèn yòu jǐnzhāng.
Hǎigé wēixiào zhe shuō: 'Zhèlǐ shì Huògēwòcí de mìmì.'
Hālì wèn: 'Mìmì shì shénme?'
Hǎigé huídá: 'Nǐ shì gè wūshī, Hālì.'
Hālì gǎndào bùkě sīyì, 'Wǒ zhēn de kěyǐ shǐyòng magic ma?'
Hǎigé diǎn tóu, 'Dāngrán kěyǐ!'
Tā jìxù shuō: 'Nǐ yǒu hěnduō péngyǒu hé lǎoshī.'
Hālì de xīn lǐ chōngmǎnle qídài, 'Wǒ néng jiàn dào tāmen ma?'
Hǎigé xiàozhe, 'Dāngrán, nǐ de màoxiǎn cái gānggāng kāishǐ.'
Hālì gǎndào yī zhǒng wēnnuǎn de gǎnjué, 'Wǒ zhēn de hěn gāoxìng.'
Hǎigé shuō: 'Jìzhù, nǐ shì tèbié de, Hālì.'
Hālì zhōngyú míngbái, tā de shēnghuó jiāng huì gǎibiàn.
Tā juédìng rènzhēn duìdài zhège xīn de shēnfèn.
Tā duì Hǎigé shuō: 'Wǒ huì nǔlì xuéxí de.'
Hǎigé mǎnyì de diǎntóu, 'Hǎo yàng de, Hālì!'
english: Harry follows Hagrid into a forest.
He feels excited and nervous.
Hagrid smiles and says: 'This is Hogwarts' secret.'
Harry asks: 'What is the secret?'
Hagrid replies: 'You are a wizard, Harry.'
Harry feels unbelievable, 'Can I really use magic?'
Hagrid nods, 'Of course!'
He continues: 'You have many friends and teachers.'
Harry's heart is full of anticipation, 'Can I meet them?'
Hagrid laughs, 'Of course, your adventure is just beginning.'
Harry feels a warm feeling, 'I am really happy.'
Hagrid says: 'Remember, you are special, Harry.'
Harry finally understands that his life will change.
He decides to take this new identity seriously.
He tells Hagrid: 'I will study hard.'
Hagrid nods in satisfaction, 'Well done, Harry!'

name: 魔法
学校
pinyin: Hālì zǒu jìnle mófǎ xuéxiào.
Tā kàn dào xǔduō wūshī hé nǚwū zài xuéxí.
Hālì gǎndào xīngfèn, 'Zhèlǐ zhēn měi!'
Tā zǒu dào yīgè dà jiàoshì.
Lǎoshī wēixiào zhe shuō: 'Huānyíng lái dào mófǎ xuéxiào.'
Hālì wèn: 'Wǒ kěyǐ xué shénme?'
Lǎoshī huídá: 'Nǐ kěyǐ xué mófǎ, fēixíng hé yàoshuǐ.'
Hālì de yǎnjīng shǎn shǎn fāguāng, 'Wǒ xiǎng chángshì!'
Lǎoshī diǎn tóu, 'Hěn hǎo, kāishǐ ba!'
Hālì kāishǐ xuéxí rúhé shǐyòng mózhang.
Tā nǔlì liànxí, 'Wǒ huì zuò dào de!'
Tóng xuémen yě zài yīqǐ xuéxí.
Hālì gǎndào hěn kāixīn, 'Wǒ yǒu péngyǒu le!'
Tāmen yīqǐ fēnxiǎng kuàilè hé zhīshì.
Hālì shuō: 'Wǒ ài zhèlǐ!'
Tā zhīdào, zhèlǐ shì tā de jiā.
english: Harry walks into the magic school.
He sees many wizards and witches studying.
Harry feels excited, 'This place is beautiful!'
He walks into a big classroom.
The teacher smiles and says: 'Welcome to the magic school.'
Harry asks: 'What can I learn?'
The teacher replies: 'You can learn magic, flying, and potions.'
Harry's eyes shine, 'I want to try!'
The teacher nods, 'Good, let's start!'
Harry begins to learn how to use a wand.
He practices hard, 'I can do it!'
The classmates are also studying together.
Harry feels very happy, 'I have friends now!'
They share joy and knowledge together.
Harry says: 'I love it here!'
He knows this is his home.

name: 新
的
开始
pinyin: Hālì zài mófǎ xuéxiào guò de fēicháng kāixīn.
Tā rènshìle xǔduō xīn péngyǒu.
Yǒu yī tiān, tā hé péngyǒumen zài cāochǎng shàng wán.
Tāmen tǎolùn zhe wèilái de kèchéng.
Hālì shuō: 'Wǒ xiǎng xué fēixíng!'
Tā de péngyǒu huíyīng: 'Wǒ yě shì!'
Zhè shí, lǎoshī zǒu guò lái.
Lǎoshī wēixiào zhe shuō: 'Nǐmen huì xué dào hěn duō yǒuqù de dōngxī.'
Hālì xīngfèn de wèn: 'Wǒmen shénme shíhòu kāishǐ?'
Lǎoshī huídá: 'Hěn kuài, zhǔnbèi hǎo ba!'
Hālì gǎndào wúbǐ qídài.
Tā zhīdào zhè shì yīgè xīn de kāishǐ.
Tā xiǎng: 'Wǒ huì nǔlì xuéxí!'
Wǎnshàng, Hālì zài sùshè lǐ sīkao.
Tā xiě xià zìjǐ de mèngxiǎng, 'Wǒ xiǎng chéngwéi yīgè wěidà de wūshī.'
Tā bì shàng yǎnjīng, xiǎngxiàng wèilái de zìjǐ.
english: Harry is very happy at the magic school.
He has made many new friends.
One day, he plays on the playground with his friends.
They discuss their future classes.
Harry says: 'I want to learn flying!'
His friend replies: 'Me too!'
At that moment, the teacher walks over.
The teacher smiles and says: 'You will learn many interesting things.'
Harry excitedly asks: 'When do we start?'
The teacher replies: 'Very soon, get ready!'
Harry feels immense anticipation.
He knows this is a new beginning.
He thinks: 'I will work hard to learn!'
In the evening, Harry reflects in the dormitory.
He writes down his dreams, 'I want to become a great wizard.'
He closes his eyes and imagines his future self.

name: 每个
人
都
是
特别
的
pinyin: Zài mófǎ xuéxiào, Hālì yùdào le xǔduō tèbié de rén.
Měi gèrén dōu yǒu zìjǐ de cáihuá hé nénglì.
Yǒu yīgè nǚhái huì shuō dòngwù yǔyán.
Hái yǒu yīgè nán hái néng shùnjiān yídòng.
Hālì gǎndào hěn jīngyà.
Tā duì péngyǒumen shuō: 'Wǒmen dōu shì tèbié de!'
Péngyǒumen diǎn tóu tóngyì, xiào zhe shuō: 'Duì a!'
Lǎoshī yě gàosù tāmen: 'Měi gèrén dōu yǒu zìjǐ de yōudiǎn.'
Hālì yìshí dào, tèbié bìng bùshì huài shì.
Tā xiǎng: 'Wǒ yě yǒu wǒ de mófǎ.'
Měi gèrén de tèbié zhī chù ràng tāmen gèngjiā dútè.
Hālì gǎndào hěn kāixīn, yīnwèi tā zhǎodào le zìjǐ.
Tā juédìng yào zhēnxié zhèxiē péngyǒu.
Wǎnshàng, Hālì zài chuáng shàng xiǎng: 'Wǒ huì nǔlì fājué wǒ de mófǎ.'
Tā xiāngxìn, měi gèrén dōu shì tèbié de.
english: At the magic school, Harry meets many special people.
Everyone has their own talents and abilities.
There is a girl who can speak animal language.
There is also a boy who can teleport.
Harry feels very surprised.
He says to his friends: 'We are all special!'
His friends nod in agreement, smiling and say: 'Yes!'
The teacher also tells them: 'Everyone has their own strengths.'
Harry realizes that being special is not a bad thing.
He thinks: 'I have my own magic too.'
Everyone's special qualities make them more unique.
Harry feels happy because he has found himself.
He decides to cherish these friends.
In the evening, Harry thinks in bed: 'I will work hard to discover my magic.'
He believes that everyone is special.
